biotools.summary: Software tool for doing blind search using peptide mass fingerprints from two proteases with different cleavage specificities. The algorithm relies on overlapping peptides for the two proteases used, and can indicate both modifications and amino acid substitutions. The method can help restrict the area where the modification has occurred.

bioschemas.name: MassShiftFinder

The method can help restrict the area where the modification has occurred.
